duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide cardiac care to surgical and procedural sedation patients
Collaborate with a variety of provider specialties in caring for patients
Admit and discharge patients from the hospital
Apply critical care skills in ICU/PCU and medical/surgical acute care setting
Provide care for open heart surgery patients

education_certification.credential: Healthcare Provider Level AHA BLS certification
One (1) year experience as a Circulating Nurse in the OR, or completion of approved didactic pre-operative nursing class
Two (2) years experience in ICU/PCU and/or a medical/surgical acute care setting
